refnamediv.refpurpose: Enforces a given condition is true

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
voidinvariant<T> Tcond stringformat mixed...
invariant tests whether cond is true. If it is not, it calls invariant_violation, otherwise it does nothing.
The Hack typechecker is aware of many common expressions for cond and will modify its knowledge of local variable types after a call to invariant.

&reftitle.parameters;
cond
Condition to test for truth.
format
sprintf-style format string to pass to invariant_violation.
